personal.name: Sakthimurugan E
personal.role: AI & Data Science Student | Web Developer | Problem Solver

personal.bio: AI & Data Science student at Mailam Engineering College with expertise in web development and Python full-stack development. Passionate about leveraging artificial intelligence and data-driven solutions to solve real-world problems. Experienced in building responsive web applications and AI-based projects.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.summary: Pixel-perfect Netflix clone with 90% UI accuracy using modern CSS and JavaScript.
projects.description: Developed a responsive Netflix clone webpage that replicates the original Netflix interface with high fidelity. The project demonstrates advanced CSS techniques, responsive design principles, and interactive JavaScript functionality.
impact: 90% UI accuracy compared to original Netflix

projects.title: Python Online Editor
projects.summary: Online Python editor with real-time syntax highlighting and code execution.
projects.description: Built an interactive Python editor that allows users to write, edit, and execute Python code in the browser. Features include syntax highlighting, real-time error detection, and instant output display.

projects.title: AI Object Detection System
projects.summary: AI-powered object detection system improving navigation efficiency by 30%.
projects.description: Designed and implemented an AI-based object detection project that enhances user navigation and interaction. The system uses machine learning algorithms to identify and classify objects in real-time.

projects.title: Event Planning RSVP System
projects.summary: Event planning platform with customizable layouts for 1,000+ users.
projects.description: Engineered a comprehensive RSVP and event planning platform featuring customizable layout builder, real-time updates, and scalable architecture to handle over 1,000 concurrent users.

experience.description: Contributed to AI-based web development projects and event management platforms.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions
